location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Lady Catherine Frere, Parell [Parel, Bombay] to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter imparting news of the family, in particular their health, and their plans for returning to England via Egypt and Naples.The letter also informs of their recent happenings including Sir Bartle laying a foundation stone for a lighthouse at Kenery [Khanderi Island] and a recent flower, fruit and vegetable show they attended to inaugurate the new market place.
